name: Isha
appearance: Light-footed with a black mirror shard on a discreet chain. Ink-stained fingertips and a smile that never quite reaches her eyes.
character: Quick-witted, playful, and hard to pin down. She enjoys the game even when the stakes cut.
traits: never sits with her back to a room
talents: reads tension in mirrored glass reflections
dreams: Build a ledger of favors that even the Syndicate must honor
secrets: Swapped a death sentence for a love letter in the Ossuary Court to save a child, against orders
Smuggled a mirror that erases faces in reflections into the city for a splinter cell she now regrets aiding
